OCC:I think what I did to stop the ark from blowing up, Makes up for When I 
tried to blow it up! 


:::Herald Speaks to DataStreak:::

"Data my good friend I need your help you must kill me."

Data:"No Herald I will not kill you ! You are the only hope to stop the 
illiad!"

Herald:"Once you told me to ask what I would of you, call when I needed 
you... Well Data I HOLD YOU TO YOUR VOW!!!!!!!!!!!"

:::Heralds Breast plate opened to revile his spark. Data gathered a ball of 
physic energy and threw in into Heralds spark. Defection went black and so to 
di Herald:::

Data:"And now herald where do we turn?"

Heralds Spark"To the stars Data, To the stars!"
